text: Cast Away is a 2000 American adventure drama movie about a FedEx employee (Tom Hanks) surviving in an uninhabited island after the plane crashed in the Pacific Ocean. It was directed by Robert Zemeckis. It gained positive reviews from critics and holds a 90% rating on Rotten Tomatoes. At the 73rd Academy Awards, Hanks was nominated for Best Actor in a Leading Role, but lost to Russell Crowe for Gladiator. == Cast == * Tom Hanks as Chuck Noland * Helen Hunt as Kelly Frears * Nick Searcy as Stan * Jenifer Lewis as Becca Twig * Chris Noth as Jerry Lovett * Lari White as Bettina Peterson * Vince Martin as Albert "Al" Miller * Geoffrey Blake as Maynard Graham ==References== == Other websites == * Category:2000 drama movies Category:2000 adventure movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Movies set in Oceania Category:Movies set on islands Category:Movies set on beaches Category:Movies set in the 1990s Category:Survival movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Zemeckis Category:Movies composed by Alan Silvestri Category:DreamWorks Pictures movies
title: Cast Away
